entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of showers. Low 8. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers. Wind becoming east 20 km/h near midnight. Low 8. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Sunday 7 May 2023

entry.title: Monday: Showers. High 15.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of showers early in the morning. A few showers beginning in the morning. Local amount 10 to 15 mm. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning then light in the afternoon. High 15. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Sunday 7 May 2023
